title: Tenant Rights
steps: Your landlord needs to give 30 days’ notice before eviction.
You can write a demand letter asking for reinstatement.
If ignored, file a complaint at the local magistrate’s court.

title: Workplace Abuse
steps: Your employer cannot withhold your salary without cause.
Document each incident with date and witness.
Send a written grievance to HR; if no response, report to the labour office.
